name: noFill()
content: Disables the fill inside shapes. Restore the fill by using the `fill()` command. For shapes, if both `noStroke()` and `noFill()` are run, nothing will be drawn to the screen.
return_value: No return value. Changes future output to the display only.
short_description: Disables the fill inside shapes. Restore the fill by using the fill() command. For shapes, if both noStroke() and noFill() are run, nothing will be drawn to the screen.
